summary: All upperclass child beds in the game are now noble child beds! Including beds in Hearthfire homes!
descriptionHtml:
Ever annoyed you that in your Hearthfire homes, the double bed is a noble bed, but the two child/single beds on the upper floor are merely upperclass? Well worry no more! This is a simple mod that aims to fix that problem. From now on, all beds marked as child beds (this includes the two single beds in the Hearthfire homes) will be noble beds instead of mere upperclass beds.

Compatibility: There should be no compatibility issues. (I use several other mods that change hearthfire homes and have no problems). Please let me know though if you do find any issues :)

REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE!!
author: simsim899
